law.catch_line: Department of Law to establish minimum standards for mold remediation companies -- Complaints to Attorney General.
law.history: Created 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 89, sec. 3, effective July 15, 2010.

metadata.lrc-note: (7/15/2010). A reference to the "Environmental and Public Protection Cabinet" in subsection (1) of this section, as created by 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 89, sec. 3, has been changed in codification to the "Public Protection Cabinet" to reflect the reorganization of certain parts of the Executive Branch, as set forth in Executive Order 2009-535 and confirmed by the General Assembly in 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24. This change was made by the Reviser of Statutes pursuant to 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 1938.
